data.name: AspectMode0.Text
data.value: The image will be zoomed in and centered, so that the image fills the image placeholder.

data.name: AspectMode1.Text
data.value: The image will be zoomed out and centered, so that the entire image fits within the image placeholder. Any margins will be displayed in the background color.

data.name: AspectMode2.Text
data.value: The image will be streched so that it fits the image placeholder. This will distort the image.

data.name: AspectMode3.Text
data.value: The height of the image placeholder will be changed to fit the image. This may change the height of the module or the layout of the stories.

data.name: AspectMode4.Text
data.value: The width of the image placeholder will be changed to fit the image. This may change the width of the module or the layout of the stories.

data.name: btnAddTag.Text
data.value: Add

data.name: lblAdvancedSettings.Help
data.value:
Advanced parameters passed to the StoriesView control. This are usually in the format:
value1: 'apples', value2: 'banana', value3: 123

data.name: lblAdvancedSettings.Text
data.value: Advanced Settings

data.name: lblAspect.Help
data.value: The site looks alot better when all of the main photos have a consistent aspect ratio (ie they are the same shape). Whenever someone uploads a story, they are asked to crop their photos using a tool that constrains their photos to a predefined aspect. You can specify that aspect here. For square, enter 1. If you want the image wider than it is high, enter a number greater than 1 (eg 1.3). If you want the image taller than it is wide, enter a number less than 1 (eg 0.8).

data.name: lblAspect.Text
data.value: PhotoAspect

data.name: lblAspectMode.Help
data.value: Stories created on this site should be cropped to the corrected aspect. However if the story image differs from the shape of this module, select how you would like the image to displayed.

data.name: lblAspectMode.Text
data.value: Aspect Mode

data.name: lblBoostLength.Help
data.value: The length of time (in days) that a story is boosted for, when an Administrator/Editor marks a story as boosted. This setting applied to all channels on this site.

data.name: lblBoostLength.Text
data.value: Boost Duration

data.name: lblChannelImage.Help
data.value: Select the image for this channel. This is used on the RSS Feed, and replaces the story image, if none is available.

data.name: lblChannelImage.Text
data.value: Channel Image

data.name: lblDisplayType.Help
data.value: Select how you would like the stories to be displayed.

data.name: lblDisplayType.Text
data.value: Display Type

data.name: lblLocation.Help
data.value: Select a location for this feed - by typing a Country/City/Location name and click search.

data.name: lblLocation.Text
data.value: Location

data.name: lblMode.Help
data.value:
"Direct Publish": New stories are published immdiately.
"Content Staging": New Stories are initially marked as draft. They will not be seen by the Public until they are published
*Note: This setting applied to all story modules on this site.

data.name: lblMode.Text
data.value: Publish Mode

data.name: lblPhotoSize.Help
data.value: Specify a Width (in pixels) for the images in this module. (The height will be determinted by the aspect).

data.name: lblPhotoSize.Text
data.value: Photo Width

data.name: lblRssName.Help
data.value: Each feed (on this site) needs a unique name. Please specify a unique name for this feed (even if you are not intending to use the RSS feed).

data.name: lblRssName.Text
data.value: RSS Name

data.name: lblShow.Help
data.value: Select the items you would like to display in the StoryList.

data.name: lblShow.Text
data.value: Show

data.name: lblSpeed.Help
data.value: Drag the sliders to set the number of seconds each item is displayed , before transitioning to the next item.

data.name: lblSpeed.Text
data.value: Speed

data.name: lblStoriesPage.Help
data.value: Select the tab, where the stories from thi module will be displayed.

data.name: lblStoriesPage.Text
data.value: View Story Page (Optional)

data.name: lblTags.Help
data.value: Please note: if you delete a tag, this tag is removed from all stories. This cannot be undone. BE CAREFUL!

data.name: lblTags.Text
data.value: Tags

data.name: lblTagsDelete.Text
data.value: Please note: if you delete a tag, this tag is removed from all stories. This cannot be undone. BE CAREFUL!

data.name: lblTagsDisplayType.Help
data.value: Select whether you would like the tags to be displayed as a category list and how.

data.name: lblTagsDisplayType.Text
data.value: Tag List Display Type
